sourcing.instructions: Chromium can be sourced from chemical supply companies or metal distributors.
steps: Chromium can be sourced from chemical supply companies or metal distributors.
1. Wear appropriate safety gear including gloves and goggles.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Wear appropriate safety gear including gloves and goggles.

steps: 1. Preheat the furnace to a temperature of 1200°C.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat the furnace to a temperature of 1200°C.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the sample to cool slowly to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the sample to cool slowly to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any irregularities or defects.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any irregularities or defects.
